scriptedEmail.name: Idea Notifications
scriptedEmail.description: Raises notifications to an idea to subscribed users of an Ideas Application.
scriptedEmail.bodyScript:
#set($profileUrl = false) #set($profileUrl = $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Author.Url)
#if ($profileUrl)
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Author.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', title='', width='32', height='32' }")
#else
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Author.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', title='', width='32', height='32' }")
#end 		#if ($profileUrl) $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Author.DisplayName #end

$context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Description('Email')

$core_v2_language.GetResource('ViewOnline')
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Footer">You received this email because you subscribed to {ideation_name_link}. You can disable these notifications {settings_link}.</resource> <resource name="ViewOnline">View online</resource> <resource name="Settings">here</resource> <resource name="Subject">{author_name} posted the idea {idea_name}</resource> </language>
